text: The Balaton Cup (Hungarian: Balaton Kupa) is an annual invitational cup competition for national women's football teams. It is held in Balatonfüred, Hungary on the shore of Lake Balaton, where it gets its name from. It is an invitational contested by 4 women's national teams from eastern Europe and it consists of 4 games: two semifinals, a third place match, and the final. ==List of finals== The list of finals: {| class="sortable wikitable" |- !Season!!Champion!!Result!!Runner-up |- |2013 || || 1–1 (5–3 p.) || |- |2014 || || 1–1 (5–4 p.) || |- |2015 || || 1–0 || |- |2016 || || 5–2 || |- |2017 || || 6–1 || |- |2018 || || 3–0 || |- |} ==Participating nations== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- style="font-size:90%;" !Team !13 !14 !15 !16 !17 !18 !Years |- |||–||–||4th||bgcolor=gold|1st||bgcolor=silver|2nd||bgcolor=#cc9966|3rd||4 |- |||–||4th||–||–||–||–||1 |- |||bgcolor=#cc9966|3rd||–||–||–||–||–||1 |- |||4th||bgcolor=#cc9966|3rd||bgcolor=#cc9966|3rd||4th||bgcolor=#cc9966|3rd||4th||6 |- |||bgcolor=silver|2nd||–||bgcolor=silver|2nd||–||–||–||2 |- |||–||bgcolor=silver|2nd||–||bgcolor=silver|2nd||4th||bgcolor=silver|2nd||4 |- |||–||–||–||bgcolor=#cc9966|3rd||bgcolor=gold|1st||bgcolor=gold|1st||3 |- |||bgcolor=gold|1st||bgcolor=gold|1st||bgcolor=gold|1st||–||–||–||3 |- |align=center|Total | 4 | 4 | 4 | 4 | 4 | 4 | |} ==References== Category:International women's association football invitational tournaments Category:Women's football friendly trophies Category:Women's football in Hungary Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2013
